data: Elebox is licensed under either Apache-2.0 or MIT license.This website built with Next.js and Nextra theme.

Command line edition of Elebox, powered by clap.
CLI currently has limited functionality.
data.usage#Usage:
If you're run via Cargo workspace (i.e. not using the released executable),
replace elebox with cargo run -p elebox-cli -- in the following command.
For example, use cargo run -p elebox-cli -- help instead of elebox help.
data.basic#Basic:
Print help message:
elebox help
Use and operate on the default database path and filename ./elebox.db:
elebox COMMAND
or a specified ./my_box.db:
elebox my_box.db COMMAND
where COMMAND can be init, part, category, export or import.
data.init#Init:
You need to initialize a database before you can proceed with the next steps.Create and initialize a new database with the default path:
elebox init
data.category#Category:
List part categories:
elebox category
Create a new part category named MCU:
elebox category new MCU
Create new part category named ARM and RISC-V, and designate them as a subcategory of MCU:
elebox category new ARM -p MCU
elebox category new "RISC-V" -p MCU
data.part#Part:
List parts:
elebox part
Create a new part named RP2040 with a part category of ARM, and a quantity of 25:
elebox part new RP2040 25 ARM
Consume or restock 10 RP2040:
elebox part use RP2040 10
elebox part add RP2040 10
Rename RP2040 to rpi-RP2040:
elebox part update RP2040 "rpi-RP2040"

data.installation#Installation: Download latest executable or installers from GitHub release.
data.step-1#Step 1: Ensure you have Rust set up.
data.step-2#Step 2:
Clone the repo:
git clone https://github.com/ziteh/elebox.git
data.step-3#Step 3:
Navigate to the workspace directory and build with Cargo:
cd elebox
cargo build

data: Graphical user interface edition of Elebox, powered by Tauri + Vue + Vuetify.
data.configyaml#config.yaml:
language: en
database: path\to\elebox.db
Path:
Windows: C:\Users\USERNAME\AppData\Local\elebox\config.yaml

data: Elebox is an out-of-the-box electronic parts inventory management tool for those who want to manage their electronic parts efficiently, but find other management tools too complicated and cumbersome.It uses an embedded database, eliminating the need to set up or installation database. The single-file database is easy to backup and supports exporting and importing data in YAML format, ensuring that your data is flexible and free.

/.title: Elebox – Lightweight Electronic Parts Inventory Tool

data:
Lightweight personal electronic parts inventory management software
Simple, intuitive, out-of-the-box, and no database setup required
Download
Overview
